data.text:
Giyani

Giyani is a city in Limpopo, in South Africa.

GPS Coordinates of Giyani, Limpopo, South Africa

Giyani is located on the latitude of -23.30246 and longitude of 30.71868 and has a geohash of kevg7jbtm4eg.

Cities and Towns near Giyani

The nearest significant population center from Giyani is Thohoyandou in Limpopo, South Africa, located 46 kilometers or 28 miles ↖ NW of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Mopani District Municipality (Limpopo, South Africa) located 52 km (32 mi) ↘ SE and Ga-Kgapane (Limpopo, South Africa) located 63 km (39 mi) ↙ SW of Giyani.

In total, we found 9 cities near Giyani in our database.
